original_text: And I will camp against thee round about, and will lay siege against thee with a mount, and I will raise forts against thee.
korean_text: 내가 너를 사면으로 둘러 진을 치며 너를 에워 대를 쌓아 너를 치리니

sentences.original_text: And I will camp against thee round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너를 둘러 진을 치겠다

sentences.original_text: and will lay siege against thee with a mount
and I will raise forts against thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너를 대적하여 요새를 세우겠다
